title: Auto attack range
body:
Hello,

I missclick sometimes becaus i mainly auto attack with right click.

So i wanna use the A button sometimes to have more accuracy. But there's no range indicator.

I have the : show attack range enabled in the interface options, but it still doesn't show any range indicator it just attacks.

replies.body:
That's odd, when you tap A there should be an indicate for the range of your basic attack.  There may be some configuring issues not loading your options correctly, see if resetting your config might help with that:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
Thanks for the reply, i found out 30min later the cause was it having a secondary key binding.
